scripts.start:server:cra: cd ./examples/create-react-app && npm install && npm run start
scripts.start:server:nextjs-auth0: cd ./examples/nextjs/nextjs-auth0 && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start:server:auth0-react: cd ./examples/nextjs/auth0-react && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start:server:auth0-vue: cd ./examples/vue/ && npm install && npm run serve
scripts.test:auth0-vue:browser: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=auth0-vue npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:auth0-vue' http-get://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:auth0-vue:headless: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=auth0-vue npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:auth0-vue' http-get://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test:nextjs-auth0:browser: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=nextjs-auth0 npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:nextjs-auth0' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:nextjs-auth0:headless: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=nextjs-auth0 npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:nextjs-auth0' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test:auth0-react:browser: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=auth0-react npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:auth0-react' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:auth0-react:headless: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=auth0-react npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:auth0-react' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test:cra:browser: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=create-react-app npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:browser
scripts.test:cra:headless: CYPRESS_TEST_MODE=create-react-app npx start-server-and-test 'npm run start:server:cra' http://localhost:3000 'npm run start:auth0' http://localhost:4000 cypress:run
scripts.test: npm run test:auth0-react:headless && npm run test:nextjs-auth0:headless && npm run test:cra:headless && npm run test:auth0-vue:headless
